About Server Leased:

SERVER LEASED is set up with an aim to serve customers in an excellent manner by providing them quality service. We strongly believe in high quality standards and hence you all always find our services better than every other host in this industry.

We understand the value of time and hence our ordering process is very simple. Customers can choose servers from multiple price levels to suit their budgets

Server Leased offering Netherlands VPS Plans With Affordable Price and 100% Satisfaction.

Features Included :
  • 24/7 Ticket and Live Chat Support
  • SolusVM Control Panel.
  • Bandwidth, RAM & CPU Graph Monitoring
  • Unbeatable Intel Xeon Processors
  • Various different operating systems to choose from.
  • Full Root Access
  • 1 Gbps Port & High Bandwidth
  • Unmetered Inbound Bandwidth
  • Easy, Unmetered & Free Operating system reinstalls.
  • cPanel (Additional Price)

Under any circumstances you are NOT allowed to use our services for:
  • Anything than can result in Spamhaus listing
  • Phishing Sites / Scam Sites (ex: Ebay/Paypal,CC/Password Scam sites)
  • Mailbombers or any sort of spam sites
  • DDoS originations
  • Spam/Mass/Bulk Emailing
  • Netscan / Hack programs and archives
  • Malicious Scripts (ex: originate DDoS attacks or hack attempts)
  • Botnet/Doorway/Carding

Note : If any of this happens, Server Leased will restrict the access to service for 2 weeks. A repeated offence will result in an immediate service termination.

Why to Choose us ?
  • 99.99% Uptime
  • No Overselling
  • 24x7x365 Support
  • Privacy assured
  • Payments by Paypal & 2Checkout!
  • Free & Fast Setup [1-6Hours]
  • 24x7x365 Support

Ans: PayPal and 2Checkout/Credit cards/Debit cards for now. More will be added soon!
